html:
(a)   Examples of nonexempt work by “any driver” for purposes of Sec l3(b)(l7) are:

 

(1)  Acting as a dispatcher.

 

(2)  Performing general clerical duties (making reports in connection with his own driving operations is within the exemption).

 

(3)  Performing general mechanical or repair services on vehicles (cleaning, washing, or making incidental minor repairs on the vehicle assigned to him as a driver are within the exemption).

 

(4)  Performing work, including driving, in connection with other business operations of the employer (i.e., not his taxicab operations), such as operation of an airport limousine service (see FOH 24c04), a pick-up and delivery service, or a moving and storage service.
